name: IB Stressed
description:
You are an IB student and you know what that means, get through an entire rotation without overstressing! In this game, you get to play several minigames related to some International Baccalaureate classes such as history, art, mathematics, and TOK.

This is the first game I've ever made and I greatly appreciate you taking your time to play it!

Music Credit:
Pierre Bondoerffer
Saga Musix
Roald Strauss
Jake Werth
Ken Snyder (coda)
Nolypants
James Opie (Nihilore)
